alert.note: Alert for Erie; Ottawa; Sandusky; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ottawa, Erie, northern Sandusky and east central Wood Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Oak Harbor to near Elmore to near Woodville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Clinton, Put-In-Bay, Oak Harbor, Gibsonburg, Genoa, Woodville, Elmore, Castalia, Catawba Island, Pemberville, Luckey, Lindsey, Rocky Ridge, Clay Center, Vickery and Whites Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
